Subject:  War sends a comm to KIllfest
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: kinger01030@...

 War sent a coded message to killfest who was only a few feet away but could 
not risk being heard by the traitors. "Let us lure them to the fake base when 
thier reinforcements arrive. Then magma's troops will ambush them. This is 
our opportunity. But wait till thier back up arrives." He tripled coded it 
directly to him in a code that would take killfest a second or two to decode.
